thumb.title: [TAS] SNES AngryFireChozo "101%" by Hoandjzj in 35:50.33
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dye9Hhy3LMM自分のクリアタイム 2時間48分（101％ではない）謎の浮遊感で賛否が分かれるハックロム自分は楽しめました。以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6443M TAS originally published on 2025-03-20 AngryFireChozo is a ROM hack of Super Metroid by DSC. Unique to this game are unintentionally modified physics quirks, which the levels are designed around. As a result, it is substantially harder than the original game, which isn't helped by the original developer admittedly not doing enough playtesting. Hoandjzj (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/Hoandjzj) nevertheless collects every item in the game and reaches 101% as fast as possible, glitching the game out in the process.ダウンロード先https://metroidconstruction.com/hack.php?id=53
thumb.last_res_body: リドリー戦は楽しそう でもないのか… やっとボス ミニファックなの？ ずっと水中なん？... ﾖｯｼｰ ただひたすらに大... 最初からずっとだ...
